蝱字的基本解释

蝱
méng
同“虻2”。

蝱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méng］
［《廣韻》武庚切，平庚，明。］
(1)昆虫名。种类很多，吮吸人、畜的血液。
(2)草名。即贝母。

蝱字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蝱； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1091第10
【唐韻】武庚切【集韻】眉耕切【正韻】眉庚切，?音盲。【說文】齧人蟲。【爾雅翼】大曰蝱，小曰䗽。【莊子·天下篇】由天地之道，觀惠施之能，其猶一蚊一蝱之勞也。【前漢·中山靖王傳】明月曜夜，蚊蝱宵見。【淮南子·說山訓】蝱散積血。　又黃蝱。【管子·地員篇】其山之旁，有彼黃蝱。　又浦蝱。【本草】靑蚨，一名蒲蝱。　又鹿蝱。秋閒蝱大小集牛馬尾，尾至重不能掉，亦名牛蝱。　又木蝱，從木葉中出，綠色如小蟬。　又飛蝱，箭名。【揚子·方言】箭之三鐮，長尺六者，謂之飛蝱。【潘岳·閒居賦】激矢蝱飛。　又鳥名。【博物志】崇丘山有鳥，一足一翼，相得而飛，名曰蝱，見則吉良，乗之壽千歲。　又山名。【山海經】大荒之中有蝱山。　又與莔通，貝母也。【詩·衞風】陟彼阿丘，言采其蝱。【疏】其葉如括樓而細小，其子在根下，如芋子正白。　又【唐韻古音】武郞切，音邙。【焦氏·易林】去如奔蝱，害不能傷。　或作虻、䖟。

Basic explanation of words
Worm
méng
Same as "Fly 2".
Worm
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méng］
["Guangyun" Wu Gengqie, Ping Geng, Ming. ]
(1) The name of the insect. There are many types, sucking the blood of humans and animals.
(2) Cursive name. That is Fritillaria.
Worm
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蝱; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1091 Page 10
[Tang Yun] Wu Geng cut [Ji Yun] Eyebrow ploughing and cutting [Zheng Yun] Eyebrow Geng cutting, sound blind. [Said the text] gnawing people. 【Erya Wing】The big day is 蝱, the little one is Tuo. 【Zhuangzi·Tianxia】From the way of heaven and earth, to observe the power of benefit, it is like a mosquito and a worm. [Previous Han·Zhongshan Jingwang Biography] Mingyue night, see you with mosquitoes. [Huainanzi·Said Mountain Training] The blood is scattered and accumulated.　Another yellow bug. [Guanzi·Diyuan Chapter] Beside the mountain, there is another yellow bug.　You Pu Ping. 【Materia Medica】Tianxiu, a cattail.　Also deer. In autumn, the large and small collection of cattle and horsetails, the tail is heavy and can not fall off, also known as the cattle worm.　It's a wooden worm, which emerges from a wooden leaf, green like a small cicada.　Flying again, the name of the arrow. [Yangtze Dialect] The three sickles of arrows and six long feet are called flying bugs. 【Pan Yue·Xianju Fu】Excited arrow flying.　Also known as the bird name. 【Natural History】Chongqiu Mountain has birds, one foot and one wing.　Also the name of the mountain. [Shan Hai Jing] There is a mountain in the great wilderness.　It's also connected with 莔, and Fritillaria. 【Poetry·Weifeng】Zhibi Aqiu, adopting his words. 【Sparse】The leaves are as small as enclosing buildings, and the seeds are under the roots, like taro white.　[Tang Yun ancient sound] Wu Yinqie, sound Manang. 【Jiao's Yilin】Go like a benjamin, and you can't hurt you.　Or as a fly, 喟.
